March 7, 1936 D Pontypridd Contest (Class C)
Pontypridd Contest (Class C) 30 Test Piece Contest Pontypridd Contest pontypridd-contest-class-c
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Pontypridd, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Ref: Merthyr Historian, vol 18, available at Merthyr Tydfil Central Library.
8 bands played.
Merthyr Express 14/3/1936 - "on Saturday" - 7th or 14th March?
Dec. 23, 2015, 3:17 p.m. Jan. 9, 2019, 1 p.m.
